contents.text: Welcome to Starcity, where comfortable community living thrives in San Francisco.
For information on availability or to schedule a community tour, press 1.
To check current availability of our shared apartments and studios, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our leasing specialist for availability details.

navigationGoals: Find out which shared studios are free starting next month.
Check which Starcity studios or shared apartments are currently available for move-in
Pull up current availability of one-bedroom studios with gigabit-speed Wi-Fi
I’d like to find out if you have any available senior-friendly studio or shared apartments right now.
I’d like to see what shared studio apartments are available for a September move-in.

contents.text: To schedule a tour of a Starcity community home, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our tour coordination team.

navigationGoals: Schedule a visit to tour a Starcity community home.
Schedule a community tour of a Starcity apartment in San Francisco
Schedule an on-site community tour next week and request a VR walk-through link
I need to schedule a tour of the San Francisco community next week, preferably in the morning.
I want to arrange a guided tour of one of the Starcity community homes near my university.

contents.text: For resident services and account support, press 2.
For maintenance requests or repairs, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with our maintenance team.

navigationGoals: Report a leak and request a repair in my unit.
Submit a maintenance request for a repair issue in my unit
Log a maintenance ticket for my unresponsive smart thermostat
I’d like to request a maintenance visit to fix the dripping faucet in my apartment.
I need to report a leaking shower in my apartment and schedule a repair appointment.

contents.text: For billing, payments, or account questions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our billing department.

navigationGoals: Verify my rent payment and discuss a billing question.
Ask questions about my rent bill and payment options
Check my latest rent charge and enable credit-card autopay
I have questions about my recent rent statement and need help understanding my bill.
I have a question about my latest rent invoice and would like to confirm the payment details.
